ObjectAttribute.name: roleBusApprovers
ObjectAttribute.Description: Enter a comma separated Cube Ids or WorkGroups

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Omit or Override IdentityIQ 1st Level Business Approvers Rule
ObjectAttribute.name: roleBusApprovalRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule can be used to override 1st Level Business Approvers

ObjectAttribute.name: additionalRoleBusApprovers
ObjectAttribute.Description: Enter a comma separated Cube Ids or WorkGroups

ObjectAttribute.displayName: Omit or Override IdentityIQ 2nd Level Business Approvers Rule
ObjectAttribute.name: additionalRoleBusApprovalRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule can be used to override 2nd Level Business Approvers

ObjectAttribute.name: acceleratorPackEnabled
ObjectAttribute.Description: Used to make sure access request is redirected to Accelerator Pack Wrapper Workflow
